results.content:
Der Kurs zeigt rasch den Aufbau einer Vue.js zu ASP.net Anwendung auf als echte Real Word Application !!, ohne die unendlichen Umwege Programmier-Erläuterungen von unendlichen Selbst-Darstellungen in anderen Kursen.

Meine Empfehlung für den sinnvollen Einstieg in Vue.js, Angular und SPA mit Asp.Net Core.
Danke

results.content: It was good to learn general concepts on how to build this specific project, but when it comes to learning spcific details, they were not covered, encryption for password was not covered neither was it explained how to process real payments. So, this is just some kind of practice but cannot be considered a formal project.
results.content_html: It was good to learn general concepts on how to build this specific project, but when it comes to learning spcific details, they were not covered, encryption for password was not covered neither was it explained how to process real payments. So, this is just some kind of practice but cannot be considered a formal project.

results.content: Like said in description, basic/intermediate knowledge of Vue.js and Web API is required because the focus of this course is on how to combine the two and not to explain syntax details. Teacher's coding is fast and to the point. I had similar project in my company, so this course was very helpful!

results.content: Coding style and project files naming is very poor, probably we are looking into a mid-level developer.
